about_the_game:
Welcome to a demo for a parkour platformer game where you have to destroy fireballs that follow you across the levels and dodge other obstacles along the way! While you jump from each platform to reach the end you must shoot and destroy the voids launching the fireballs at you before losing three lives. This must be done in order to complete each level and section so you can escape from the demon who has held you hostage.

This demo is 8 levels compared to the 31 total levels of the game. This demo excludes multiple powerups, and text or animation sequences, which may be included in the full game. This game includes various enemies, room designs, and unique sound effects which continuously get weirder as you progress.

Will you be able to escape?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain mature themes, involving a monster capturing a boy who must destroy and avoid enemies to escape from captivity.
